channel.title: Comments on: Spaghetti Os From Amazon

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/03/30/spaghetti-os-from-amazon/#comment-2944">Elizabeth Scott</a>.
What, no meatballs!? What's the point of being an adult if I can't get the deluxe Spaghetti Os? :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Elizabeth Scott.

What, no meatballs!? What’s the point of being an adult if I can’t get the deluxe Spaghetti Os? ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Elizabeth Scott
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Scott
item.description: Just don't get the kind with meatballs. Those things are gross.
item.content:encoded: Just don’t get the kind with meatballs. Those things are gross.
